title: How is the literacy rate of a country determined? - Quora

response.answer_text: First and foremost, this depends upon both the country and the organization making the determination.  The lack of a standard definition of literacy is a big problem.  Two common methods for determining literacy are self-assessment and testing.  With self-assessment, the person is asked to rate his or her own literacy.  With testing, of course, an actual test is administered and evaluated.
